channel.title: Yuval Kogman on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Yuval Kogman on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Zerolink Sudoku - real vs perceived anonymity
item.description: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1171788514326908928 Introduction I used to work in software. I transitioned to something else, but bitcoin changed my mind. This talk is a little bit of a work in progress. This was started by a guy named Aviv Milner who is involved with Wasabi. He roped me into this and then subsequently became unavailable. So this is basically me presenting his work. It’s been severely ……. as I said, Aviv started this project, he defined the research questions and then became unavailable so I’m here presenting in his stead.
